document.full_text: internet content delivery company level 3 communications inc  is to buy smaller rival global crossing ltd  for about $1.9 billion in stock to strengthen its fiber-optics networks business and expand into europe and latin america.
document.title: level 3 adds muscle with $1.9 billion global crossing buy
lines_and_colors: internet content delivery company level 3 communications inc  is to buy smaller rival global crossing ltd  for about $1.9 billion in stock to strengthen its fiber-optics networks business and expand into europe and latin america.
